dataset.title: Registered customers by entity type
dataset.description: Includes all customers registered with Inland Revenue, either individuals or entities.

dataset.title: Registered customers by geographic areas
dataset.description: Includes all customers registered with Inland Revenue, either individuals or entities. Geographic area is determined by proximity to district office.

dataset.title: Active customers by entity type
dataset.description: Shows the number of active customers grouped by entity type.

dataset.title: Active customers by geographic areas
dataset.description: Shows the number of active customers by geographic area. Area is defined through proximity to district office.

dataset.title: Registered customers by group
dataset.description: Registered customer groups shown here are, non-profit organisations, large enterprises, individuals and small and medium enterprises.

dataset.title: Use of return filing channels
dataset.description: Describes the use of the three core channels used for filing tax data (eFiling,  online filing using myIR secure login services or paper based filing)
dataset.theme: Income Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Fringe Benefit Tax, PAYE

dataset.title: Number of customers by return types
dataset.description: The data includes customers who filed tax returns for a specific tax year regardless of when their return was actually filed.
dataset.theme: Income Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Fringe Benefit Tax, PAYE

distribution.title: Number of customers by return types
Number of customers by return types

dataset.title: Returns filed
dataset.description: The number of returns filed and processed during the tax year regardless of their return period.
dataset.theme: Income Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Fringe Benefit Tax, PAYE

dataset.title: Number of tax agents by geographic area
dataset.description: The number of tax agents in a given geographic loction. A tax agent is a person who prepares the annual returns of income for ten or more taxpayers.

distribution.title: Number of tax agents by geographic area
Number of tax agents by geographic area

dataset.title: Number of clients of tax agents by geographic area
dataset.description: List of the number of clients of tax agents by geographic area. Area defined by proximity to district office.

distribution.title: Number of clients of tax agents by geographic area

dataset.title: Revenue collected
dataset.description: Revenue collected on an acruals basis between 2008 and 2017 by Inland Revenue.
dataset.theme: Income Tax, Goods and Services Tax, Fringe Benefit Tax, Withholding Tax, Imputation taxes

dataset.title: Income distributions of individual customers
dataset.description: Estimates of the number of individuals in tax bands & aggregate taxable income and income tax for people in each income band. The income and tax information is derived from IR3 tax returns, personal tax summaries, and employer PAYE information.

dataset.title: Wage/salary distributions for individual customers
dataset.description: Wage/salary income, includes gross earnings received from any employer, that PAYE was deducted from. Earnings that are excluded from this are: NZ Super, Taxable welfare benefits, student allowances, earnings-related ACC payments and shareholder-employee salaries.

dataset.title: Net GST by turnover band
dataset.description: Net total GST by turnover band. The following GST data is based on information from GST returns and is different from the accrual data presented in the "Tax revenue" section.

dataset.title: Number of GST filers by turnover band
dataset.description: The number of GST filers grouped by turnover band. The GST data only includes GST collected or refunded by Inland Revenue. GST collected on imports by the New Zealand Customs Service is not included.

distribution.title: Number of GST filers by turnover band
Number of GST filers by turnover band

dataset.title: Donation Rebate Frequency
dataset.description: The number of Donation rebates claimed between 2007 and 2016.

dataset.title: Donation Rebate Average Amount
dataset.description: The average amount per donation rebate between 2007 and 2016.

dataset.title: Income of trusts IR6 returns
dataset.description: The total income of trusts that allocated beneficiary or trustee income. This data was extracted on 25 September 2017. All data is subject to further updates, but the data for 2016 in particular is incomplete.

dataset.title: Working for Families Tax Credits - number of families
dataset.description: Working for Families Tax Credits is a collective term for a number of tax credits paid to families with dependent children. Data set includes the number of families involved. The data is based on March year entitlements, assessed on tax returns and supplemented with the payments data from Work and Income recorded on their EMS schedule. (This data is considered incomplete until 31/03/18). Types of Working for Families Tax Credits included are Family Tax Credit, In-work tax credit, Minimum family tax credit, Parental tax credit.

distribution.title: Working for Families Tax Credits - number of families
Working for Families Tax Credits - number of families

dataset.title: Working for Families Tax Credits - Average Entitlement
dataset.description: Working for Families Tax Credits is a collective term for a number of tax credits paid to families with dependent children. Data set includes the average entitlement amount. The data is based on March year entitlements assessed on tax returns and supplemented with the payments data from Work and Income recorded on their EMS schedule. (data considered incomplete until 31/03/18)

distribution.title: Working for Families Tax Credits - Average Entitlement
Working for Families Tax Credits - Average Entitlement

dataset.title: Number of child support customers and cash collection
dataset.description: The number of customers claiming child support per annum.

distribution.title: Number of child support customers and cash collection
Number of child support customers and cash collection

dataset.title: Total overdue debt
dataset.description: The total overdue tax debt, the overdue child support debt, the number of customers in debt, the number of debt cases, and the annual debt dynamics for the financial years 2008 to 2017
dataset.theme: PAYE, Income Tax, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Student Loans, Goods and Services Tax, Duties, Fringe Benefit Tax

dataset.title: Overdue debt by tax type
dataset.description: The structure of the total overdue debt for various different tax types for the financial years from 2008 to 2017. (child support debt, student loan debt, tax debt, working for families tax credits debt)
dataset.theme: PAYE, Income Tax, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Student Loans, Goods and Services Tax, Duties, Fringe Benefit Tax

dataset.title: Overdue debt by debt age
dataset.description: The dynamics of overdue debt case age from the 2008 to 2017 financial years. It covers both overdue tax debt and overdue child support debt. The debt age structure is presented both for dollar values and debt cases. The age of each debt case is weighted based on weighted overdue debt case age.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Income Tax, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Student Loans, Goods and Services Tax, Duties, Fringe Benefit Tax

dataset.title: Overdue debt by debt value bands
dataset.description: The composition of overdue tax debt and overdue child support debt by dollar value bands. The Analysis is presented for both the value of debt and the proportion of debt cases.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Income Tax, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Student Loans, Goods and Services Tax, Duties, Fringe Benefit Tax

distribution.title: Overdue debt by debt value bands
Overdue debt by debt value bands

dataset.title: Percentage of returns filed on time
dataset.description: The ratio of returns filed on time to the total number of filing per tax year. The ratio is presented separately for tax types and customer groups.
dataset.theme: Goods & Services Tax, PAYE, Income Tax

distribution.title: Percentage of returns filed on time
Percentage of returns filed on time

dataset.title: Percentage of payments made on time
dataset.description: The percentage of on time payments for the major tax types.
dataset.theme: Goods & Services Tax, PAYE, Income Tax

distribution.title: Percentage of payments made on time
Percentage of payments made on time

dataset.title: Percentage of child support payments made by liable parents in full and on time
dataset.description: The percentage of payments made by liable parents in full and on time.

distribution.title: Percentage of child support payments made by liable parents in full and on time
Percentage of child support payments made by liable parents in full and on time

dataset.title: Regional tax statistics 2016
dataset.description: Included are categories for individuals and non-individual entities. The tables present the data as percentages of appropriate columns in the "Customers" table, Regional tax statistics, 'all customers', 'values', 'individuals', 'business individuals', 'non-business individuals', 'entities', 'businesses'
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: All Customers
dataset.description: A regional break-down for different customer categories, such as "registered customers", "individuals", and "individuals aged 16 or over".
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Values
dataset.description: regional break-downs for variables such as overall sales and income and debt values, broken down by tax type
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Individuals
dataset.description: Employment statistics relating to individuals based on region.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Business individuals
dataset.description: General Statistics relating to business operations based on region.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Non-business individuals
dataset.description: General Statistics relating to non-business operations based on region.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Entities
dataset.description: General statistics relating to entity types based on region.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Business
dataset.description: General Statistics relating to business types based on region.
dataset.theme: PAYE, Goods & Services Tax, Income Tax, Imputation Taxes, Withholding Tax, Child Support, Working for Families Tax Credits, Student Loans, Fringe Benefit Tax, Customer

dataset.title: Outcome of cases decided by Disputes Review Unit
dataset.description: The outcomes of adjudication cases decided by the Disputes Review Unit. All cases are split into five categories depending on the degree to which the position of the Commissioner of Inland Revenue (CIR) was upheld.

distribution.title: Outcome of cases decided by Disputes Review Unit
Outcome of cases decided by Disputes Review Unit

dataset.title: Shortfall penalty impositions
dataset.description: The number and value of shortfall penalties in total and by category. A shortfall penalty (SFP) is one imposed as a percentage of a tax shortfall (a deficit or understatement of tax), resulting from certain actions on the part of a taxpayer.

dataset.title: Binding rulings
dataset.description: The number of draft rulings issued that are counted under the timeliness measures and the average time to complete those draft rulings.

dataset.title: Number of tax convictions
dataset.description: The total number of tax convictions under the Tax Administration Act 1994 in each calendar year.

dataset.title: Number of people convicted under the Tax Administration Act
dataset.description: The number of people convicted under the Tax Administration Act 1994 in each calendar year. A person may have more than one prosecution in each year.

distribution.title: Number of people convicted under the Tax Administration Act
Number of people convicted under the Tax Administration Act

dataset.title: IRD number applications
dataset.description: This report provides information around IRD number applications by individuals and non-individuals. It includes information around the residency status of applicants and their reasons for applying (If this is for the purpose of purchasing property).

dataset.title: Unpaid Taxes due to Small Business Liquidations
dataset.description: Total amount of unpaid taxes due to small business liquidations.

distribution.title: Unpaid Taxes due to Small Business Liquidations
Unpaid Taxes due to Small Business Liquidations

dataset.title: Inland Revenue Commissioner's Expenses
dataset.description: Total expenses attributed to Inland Revenue's commissioner

dataset.title: Inland Revenue Commissioner's Expenses
dataset.description: Total expenses attributed to Inland Revenue's commissioner

dataset.description: Quarterly survey results for customer satisfaction and perception of Inland Revenue

IDI Data Dictionary:
IR tax data

Documents the content of the
datasets the Inland Revenue  provides to Statistics New Zealand to use in the
Integrated Data Infrastructure (IDI).

dataset.title: Income distributions of individual customers 2001 - 2018

dataset.description: Statistics relating to wage/salary income including any gross earnings received from any employer, from which PAYE was deducted.

dataset.title: Net GST by turnover band 2007 to 2019
dataset.description: Statistics relating to Inland Revenue administered GST  but not including gross GST collected by the New Zealand Customs Service
